name: John Doe
summary: Experienced software developer with a passion for creating web and mobile applications. Proficient in a variety of programming languages and technologies.

projects.title: E-commerce Website
projects.description: Built a responsive e-commerce website using React and Node.js. Implemented features like user authentication, product catalog, and shopping cart.

projects.title: Mobile Task Manager App
projects.description: Developed a mobile app using React Native for task management. Users can create, update, and prioritize tasks on the go.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Designed and developed a personal portfolio website to showcase my projects and skills. Used HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

work_experience.description: Worked on a team responsible for developing and maintaining web applications. Collaborated with clients to gather requirements and deliver high-quality software solutions.
Completed a summer internship focused on front-end development. Assisted in building user interfaces and improving website performance.
